abstract: As InBev starts up friendly talks with Anheuser-Busch, the Belgian brewer has kicked off syndicating the $45 billion in debt it needs to acquire the Budweiser maker.
lead_paragraph: As InBev starts up friendly talks with Anheuser-Busch, the Belgian brewer has kicked off syndicating the $45 billion in debt it needs to acquire the Budweiser maker.

headline.main: InBev Said to Begin Wide Syndication of Anheuser Deal Debt
